headline.print_headline: For Masters, Waiting Is the Hardest Part
headline.main: For Masters, Waiting Is the Hardest Part

snippet: The first shot of this year’s Masters will be struck 235 days after the last putt of the P.G.A. Championship, rattling some players’ nerves.
lead_paragraph: The first shot of this year’s Masters will be struck 235 days after the last putt of the P.G.A. Championship, rattling some players’ nerves.
